messages.content: As a local resident, I am extremely proud to be the Conservative parliamentary candidate for North Swindon. I have a long track record as a formidable local councillor, where I have never once claimed a penny in expenses and have a 100% attendance record. I have the local knowledge, enthusiasm and drive to stand up for our community. If I am elected at the next General Election, I will work tirelessly to put fellow local residents first, no excuses.

politicalExperience.achievements: Never claimed a penny in expenses and have a 100% attendance record
